title: Person Of Interest || Core Code (Season 2)
author: Real Scorsese
comment: So VERY well done!  Truly brings it home how much I miss this wonderful show!
All the important scenes - nice work as always. I like that you edit in a quiet way, not too many cuts that make your head spin.
Thank you for this! Looking forward to season 3, it's looking great :D. The storm is just beginning...
Faut vraiment que je m'y mette à cette série, good job!
description:
The montage on season 2 is available! So you like it? We'II meet for season 3 soon.

Song: Core Code Ramin Djawadi
